update.description:
Deprecated all the constructors, and also functions which return `Matrix3` and `Matrix4`. Also stopped using `Angle`.

Quaternion is widely used in `Pose`. If we don't get to deprecate pose, we won't be able to remove the quaternion class in Gazebo8. But at least we can remove the classes mentioned above. (And all others, all we miss now is `Pose` and `Vector3`)
update.title: Deprecate quaternion

content.raw:
~~**Please hold on reviewing**~~

Quaternion is used in a lot of places, so I think just deprecating the constructors like we did for the other classes can be risky. I'll go ahead and deprecate each single function. This will assure we're getting rid of all instances, even the ones we don't construct (ones passed as params for example).
content.html:
Please hold on reviewing

Quaternion is used in a lot of places, so I think just deprecating the constructors like we did for the other classes can be risky. I'll go ahead and deprecate each single function. This will assure we're getting rid of all instances, even the ones we don't construct (ones passed as params for example).

content.raw: No unexpected failures, and the warnings have been fixed in 5e79dd2 . Thanks, @scpeters !
content.html: No unexpected failures, and the warnings have been fixed in 5e79dd2 . Thanks, @scpeters !
